version_description:
New Extra Life Bonuses!

GAMER: Get a notice when you’ve played 3 games towards 5. Get an Extra Life at 5!

LIFELINE: Refer a friend to signup within 24 hours of hitting 0 Lives and get 4 Extra Lives!

MAVEN: Refer a friend who signs up, and then have another friend signup within 24 hours and get 4 Extra Lives!

New user profile screen.

Performance improvements and bug fixes.

Refined dragon tooth extract. Really.

New Extra Life Bonuses!
GAMER: Get a notice when you’ve played 3 games towards 5. Get an Extra Life at 5!

LIFELINE: Refer a friend to signup within 24 hours of hitting 0 Lives and get 4 Extra Lives!

MAVEN: Refer a friend who signs up, and then have another friend signup within 24 hours and get 4 Extra Lives!

New user profile screen.

Performance improvements and bug fixes.

Refined dragon tooth extract. Really.

Cleaned up the winnings screen so you can, ummm… see your most recent winnings!

Sometimes when you try to load a Secret Game, it’s expired. The app would hang. Now it doesn’t.

You’ve been itching to join us on Reddit and Twitter? Well, now you’ve got handy buttons to help you get there.

Added a quantum computing AI that can be your best friend.
We opened a drawer, and found some bugs. We decided not to keep them.
Some people reported that they didn’t see all their games and winnings in the “Game History” screen. We did some minor surgery on the app, and now… history is yours to enjoy!
Fixes for splash.

Play mini games and win real money.
NEW: BUY EXTRA LIVES. Hey big spender, spend a little time with me!

1 Extra Life = 3.99
4 Extra Lives = 9.99

Enjoy!
We updated cost for 4 Extra Lives!

Send scores from practice runs to official scoreboard for 2 Extra Lives. No more excuses for choking on official runs!

Some bugs crept in under the covers so we fumigated.

Leaderboard Tiers: The top of top players get extra payouts. First place $7! Practice makes perfect.

Better prediction of your practice run rank.

On the leaderboard, you can see the cutoff score to make the top 20%.

Performance improvements.

Portable wormhole.

Better presentation of leaderboard tiers, including customizing tiers.

Our lepidopterologist found some pretty bugs, killed them humanely, and then pinned them inside a bespoke glass case, to admire forever and ever.

Bandersnatch module.

BIGGEST UPDATE EVER - SUBSCRIPTIONS - PLAY PAST GAMES - NEW DESIGN

Subscribe to Ready Games for $6.99 a month. Exclusive subscriber benefits:
** 9 extra lives each month
** Play the last 30 days of Ready games
** Access to all Secret Game codes.

New score assessment screen with custom emojis.

New side menu to find important things faster.

See your lifetime winnings.

Faster loading leaderboard.

16 candles.

BIGGEST UPDATE EVER - SUBSCRIPTIONS - PLAY PAST GAMES - NEW DESIGN
Subscribe to Ready Games for $6.99 a month. Exclusive subscriber benefits:
** 9 extra lives each month
** Play the last 30 days of Ready games
** Access to all Secret Game codes.

New score assessment screen with custom emojis.

New side menu to find important things faster.

See your lifetime winnings.

Faster loading leaderboard.

16 candles.

Minor UI updates.

Itty bitty bug fixes.

Celery Processor.

** Discounted Extra Life packs for subscribers only! 50% OFF! **
Tap on any leaderboard avatar to see how much money they’ve won, games played, and lives earned.
Share the last 8 seconds of your gameplay!
Loading the leaderboard should be faster.
Extra secret sauce.

** Discounted Extra Life packs for subscribers only! 50% OFF! **
Fixed performance issues.

** Discounted Extra Life packs for subscribers only! 50% OFF! **
Some UI polish, so it’s even more shiny!
We enjoyed a bug hunt so you don’t have to.

** Discounted Extra Life packs for subscribers only! 50% OFF! **
View top winners for the past 30 days on the leaderboard.
100% cruelty free. No animals were harmed in the making of this update.

** Discounted Extra Life packs for subscribers only! 50% OFF! **
View top winners for the past 30 days on the leaderboard.
100% cruelty free. No animals were harmed in the making of this update.

Bug hunt and optimization extravaganza!
After all the big updates - like subscriptions - we went in and made the app run even better.
Enjoy!

More chances to WIN! More GAMES every day! New stunning design! This is Ready 2.0!
*** Scrolling feed lets you play multiple games!
*** New game types: JUST 4FUN; TOURNAMENT ONLY (can’t submit practice scores for extra challenge); SUBSCRIBER ONLY; and the classic MAIN GAME.
*** Secret promotions in the feed just for you!
*** Less memory use - Ready runs better on lower-end phones.

May the force be with you, Ready Player!

*** After our massive multi-game release we went and hunted down some bugs.
*** We added a new “Joystick” behavior- stay tuned for some games using it!
*** We deployed a machine-learning algorithm to predict the future. Just rub the phone three times and ask it a question. Only 3 tries!

*** Improved speed and general performance.
*** Eliminated ability to pause game play by switching apps.
*** Fixed game history bug.

PS: Improved Flux Capacitor time travel system... Great Scott!!!

*** Improved speed and general performance.
*** Eliminated ability to pause game play by switching apps.
*** Fixed game history bug.

PS: Improved Flux Capacitor time travel system... Great Scott!!!

*** New game mechanics! Smoother difficulty curves in games. Stay tuned!
*** A slicker leaderboard view!
*** Loads-o-tiny-tweaks to make it more yum!
*** Machine-learning vaporware!

*** Performance improvements and UI polish.
*** That’s it for today!

* Some sweet new UI on the pop overs. Toasty!
* More doodads under the hood.
“You may ask yourself
Where does that highway go to?”

* Optimized the loading screen.
* Tweaked some pop overs.
* Added more analytics.
* Convinced you to read this far!

* Faster loading of the lobby.
* Some bug fixing.
And there you have it!
- several fixes
Bug fixes and performance improvements

*New Player Ranks: show how experienced any player is. Climb the ranks to be a “Ready Grand Master”. Ranks include:
-Bronze
-Silver
-Gold
-Diamond
-Master
-Grand Master

*Stay on your toes with the new “Variable cost to submit” games.
*Some bug fixing
*May contain “stay at home boredom medicine”
Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements
Bug fixes and secret sauce.

NEW ARCADE MODE!
Enter the Ready Arcade and progress through a variety of games to win real-money cash prizes! Unlock and upgrade power-ups to help you reach the top score!

NEW ARCADE FEATURES:
- Progress through different games by collecting enough tickets to unlock the next level
- Utilize power-ups to double your score and win even more!
- Earn experience points to level up and gain more ticket prizes
- Collect the mystery box for more tokens to play every day!
- Easy to play games, but hard to master
- Convert Arcade tickets into more chances to win cash prizes!


CONSTANTLY UPGRADING
Look out for new game modes and special events in the future.

Mini Games. Much Prizes.
#ReadyAF

-New Quests in each arcade stage for more chances to show your skills.
-New Claw machine with surprise rewards.
-More fun games with new twists.
A small bug fix!
